text: (maḻayeppaṟṟi) santēāṣasūcakamāyikkeāṇṭuṁ, tanṟe kāruṇyattil ninn niṅṅaḷkk anubhavippikkān vēṇṭiyuṁ, tanṟe kalpanaprakāraṁ kappal sañcarikkuvān vēṇṭiyuṁ, tanṟe anugrahattil ninn niṅṅaḷ upajīvanaṁ tēṭuvān vēṇṭiyuṁ, niṅṅaḷ nandikāṇikkuvān vēṇṭiyuṁ avan kāṟṟukaḷe ayakkunnat avanṟe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷil peṭṭatatre
